subject: Sports Injuries
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks signed Jeremy Lin, cut this month by the Warriors and the Rockets, as a short-term backup at point guard while the rookie Iman Shumpert recovers from a knee injury.
snippet: The Knicks signed Jeremy Lin, cut this month by the Warriors and the Rockets, as a short-term backup at point guard while the rookie Iman Shumpert recovers from a knee injury.
